Class PhantomGain

java.lang.Object
  Thing
      Character
          PhantomGain

public class PhantomGain
extends Character

The PhantomGain enemy that appears randomly and moves through walls towards the player This Enemy represents the actual financial term of a phantom gain where investment is loss.

Author:
John Kim, Tanner Lai, Raymond Zhao
